content: Good Reminder Darius to everyone within 10 years of your age group older or younger; I was lucky that my determination to freed me from working more than 3 to 6 months at jobs. It was seldom the job which I detested or become bored with so quickly but the required standard 8 to 5 or 9 to 6 schedules and those you were forced to work together. The two words “friends” and “love” are probably the most misused words in all languages. The work place where the most ambitious, smart and determined people spend most of their lives from the mid 20s to the mid 40s leads to confusion mood swings, divorces and unappreciated efforts where fellow employees find themselves caught up in the politics of the work place and question how they chose to live their lives.
